short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch sonyliv videos in sync with friends and family

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your SonyLiv Party sessions to a whole new level of enjoyment with our exclusive Chrome extension! Dive into an immersive shared experience as you and your loved ones watch SonyLiv Party content together, no matter where you are. Engage in real-time conversations through text or video chat while indulging in your favorite movies and shows. Our extension is designed with simplicity in mind, ensuring effortless usage for all. Best of all, it's completely free and guarantees a secure and synchronized viewing experience. Connecting with friends and family over your preferred content has never been this seamless!
